TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IActivator

Docs.summary: Provides the basic functionality for a remoting activator class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Activators control and participate in the activation of marshal by reference objects. Some activators create contexts, whereas others create actual objects.
Activators use the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IActivator.NextActivator%2A> property to form a hierarchy that must be observed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage Activate(class System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage msg) cil managed

Docs.param: The information about the object that is needed to activate it, stored in a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage">.
Docs.summary: Creates an instance of the object that is specified in the provided <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage">.
Docs.returns: Status of the object activation contained in a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage">.

Docs.summary: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.ActivatorLevel"> where this activator is active.
Docs.value: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.ActivatorLevel"> where this activator is active.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Level is used to locate the right position in the chain when adding an activator.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the next activator in the chain.
Docs.value: The next activator in the chain.
